types.name: Creature
types.description: Living beings that can attack and block.

types.name: Spell
types.description: Magical effects that resolve and go to the graveyard.

types.name: Instant
types.description: Spells that can be cast at any time.

types.name: Artifact
types.description: Magical objects that remain on the battlefield.

keywords.name: Flying
keywords.description: This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying.

keywords.name: Haste
keywords.description: This creature can attack the turn it enters the battlefield.

keywords.name: Vigilance
keywords.description: This creature doesn't tap when it attacks.

keywords.name: Trample
keywords.description: This creature can deal excess combat damage to the defending player.

keywords.name: First Strike
keywords.description: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

keywords.name: Double Strike
keywords.description: This creature deals combat damage twice during combat.

keywords.name: Deathtouch
keywords.description: Any amount of damage this creature deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

keywords.name: Lifelink
keywords.description: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.
